name: Horror Camera test
description:
Left Click to turn your flashlight on/off. Right Click changes camera angle. WASD to move, Mouse to aim flashlight. Try to find the bear in the scene!

The idea here is for a survival horror/farming sim.

The player would manage their "farm" using the convenience of the top-down view, which would show their crops and allow farm management. Then, when enemies appear, the player can switch to 3rd person view for easy aiming & combat. 3rd person could also be used to look around the area to find hidden objects.

Made in 1 hour, that's why it's janky!
